resources.string: Please grant location permission to start the service
You have not granted location permission. So the service cannot be started.
Please make sure that you have active internet connection.
No Google Playservice found. Please install it.

Welcome to Continuous Care. This application was designed to help you configure the necessary devices to allow you to have all the funcionalities of the platform unlocked. The devices we support and will help you to configure are the Fitbit Charge 3, a fitness armband and the Foobot, a stationary air quality indicator. Lastly, this application also serves to provide your location to our system, this information will be kept private and will only serve to calculate the environment conditions from where you are.
